Room.Name: Carnival Midway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the midway of the annual Carnival and Sideshow in Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: Excited groups of people make their along here, and the noise level is pretty high. Bright flags and banners fly overhead, and the tents are in wild colors, many of them multi-hued in stripes, and some with odd symbols painted on them. Wedged between two large tents you see a small one with an old silver star hanging over the entrance.
